1405600.name: RPG Maker MZ - Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 7
1405600.description:
From a manipulative Devil Girl to fearless Axe-Warrior and seductive Succubus, we've got your leading lady's needs covered! Whether you're looking to switch up your party dynamic or simply wish for more variety, you can't go wrong with any of the 16 characters featured in this collection!

Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 7 makes it easier than ever to integrate a new female character into your project by offering matching walking sprites, front-view battlers, facesets, bust-up images and animated SV battlers.

Inspired by both classic fantasy elements and a modern manga aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources!

Features:

* 16 characters (Almiraj, Axe-warrior, Butterfly Girl, Devil Girl, Elf, Gorgone, Hanbok 1-4, Kyubi, Lamia, Seamstress, Snow Woman, Succubus 1 & 2)
*16 Battlers with 13 variations each = 208 graphics (also, some have "aura version")
* 16 walking sprites
* 16 Animated SV battlers
* 16 facesets with 8 emotions each
* 16 portrait bust images with 8 emotions each = 128 graphics (also, some have "no weapon" version)
* BONUS: All 16 characters in large-scale full-character artwork
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice!
* This pack is compatible with RPG Maker MV and RPG Maker MZ
1405600.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
